attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to directly intervene and compel Cambridgeshire Police to drop their objections to Strawberry Fair 2010 and not stand in the way of the decision of elected councillors to grant it a licence to run in 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cambridgeshire Police have made it absolutely clear they do not want the event to go ahead and have put an incredible amount of time and resource into preventing it, even going as far as to ignore the decision of elected councillors to grant Strawberry Fair a licence to run in 2010. We feel the police action shows just how far out of step they are with the people of Cambridge, who have shown overwhelming support for the event; and had the same enthusiasm been spent on working with us rather than fighting us, many of their key concerns would have been dealt with.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
